channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenBSD -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenBSD -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-52558|2024-07-05T17:22:06.335Z -- openbsd -- openbsd
item.description: In OpenBSD 7.4 before errata 002 and OpenBSD 7.3 before errata 019, a network buffer that had to be split at certain length that could crash the kernel after receiving specially crafted escape sequences.

item.title: CVE-2023-52556|2024-07-05T17:22:06.447Z -- openbsd -- openbsd
item.description: In OpenBSD 7.4 before errata 009, a race condition between pf(4)'s processing of packets and expiration of packet states may cause a kernel panic.

item.title: CVE-2023-52558|2024-03-01T16:39:00.281Z -- openbsd -- openbsd
item.description: In OpenBSD 7.4 before errata 002 and OpenBSD 7.3 before errata 019, a network buffer that had to be split at certain length that could crash the kernel after receiving specially crafted escape sequences.

item.title: CVE-2023-52557|2024-03-01T16:26:42.158Z -- openbsd -- openbsd
item.description: In OpenBSD 7.3 before errata 016, npppd(8) could crash by a l2tp message which has an AVP (Attribute-Value Pair) with wrong length.

item.title: CVE-2023-52556|2024-03-01T16:24:46.415Z -- openbsd -- openbsd
item.description: In OpenBSD 7.4 before errata 009, a race condition between pf(4)'s processing of packets and expiration of packet states may cause a kernel panic.
